ValidationRule.description: stage can be updated from 'Recall' to 'Submitted' or 'Archive' only
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND($Profile.Name <> "System Administrator",AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(NDIAQuoteStage__c), "Recall"), ISPICKVAL(NDIAQuoteStage__c, "Final") ) || AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(NDIAQuoteStage__c), "Recall"), ISPICKVAL(NDIAQuoteStage__c, "In progress") ) || AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(NDIAQuoteStage__c), "Recall"), ISPICKVAL(NDIAQuoteStage__c, "Not yet commenced") ) || AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(NDIAQuoteStage__c), "Recall"), ISPICKVAL(NDIAQuoteStage__c, "Approval In Progress") ) || AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(NDIAQuoteStage__c), "Recall"), ISPICKVAL(NDIAQuoteStage__c, "Approved") ) || AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(NDIAQuoteStage__c), "Recall"), ISPICKVAL(NDIAQuoteStage__c, "Rejected") ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Stage can only be manually updated from 'Recall' to 'Submitted' or 'Archive'
